revised_title: Anatomy of Plants: Observations on the Structure and Function of Bark, Wood, Buds, Leaves, and Roots
tldr: The author examines the structure and function of various plant parts, including bark, wood, buds, leaves, and roots, and discusses the role of juices and fermentation in plant nutrition and growth. He also explores the importance of air and respiration in plant life and the process of transpiration.
